text: Anastasia's sequence: 1st term is 2, 2nd is 4, 3rd is 6. What is the 8th term?
Which chart is most appropriate to show if the number of ice cream sales changes with the temperature?
explanation: Scatter graphs show correlation between variables.

text: Which three amounts are equivalent?
The ratio of pots to seeds is 1:4. If there are 6 pots, how many seeds are there?
What is the next number in the sequence: 11/10, 9/10, 7/10, 5/10?
Eva wants to see if older children play more sport. She asks for Name and Sport Hours. What else must she ask?
options: What time of day do you do sport?
explanation: Age is needed to correlate with time spent.

text: What is the next number in the sequence: 11/10, 9/10, 7/10, 5/10?
Carlos says he is less likely to roll a 6 than other numbers on a fair six-sided dice. Why is he wrong?
explanation: A fair die has equal odds for all faces.

text: A circle is inside a square. Which part of the circle has the same length as the side of the square?
explanation: The diameter spans the width of the square.

text: In the sequence of square numbers (1, 4, 9...), what is the 4th term and which term equals 81?
Which pair of values satisfies: 1/5 < X < 4/5 and 0.4 > Y > 1/4?
For the distances 8, 35, 15, 50, 10, 2 (km), what are the range and the mean?
Using Ottawa's temp table, which two months have the same difference between high and low temperatures?
explanation: Both months have a 9 degree difference.

text: Mia has a 5kg bag of potatoes. She uses 1kg. What percentage of the bag of potatoes is left?
Jamila uses 1 1/4 pieces of wood, each 5 metres long. What is the total length of wood used?
A cube has a surface area of 96 cm2. What is the area of one face of the cube?
What number between 1270 and 1280 has a remainder of 4 when divided by 8?
To estimate the mass of 24 books (542g each) in 3 boxes, Mike uses 25 * 3 * [ ]. What number is missing?
Which calculation finds the 10th term of the sequence 4, 7, 10, 13... without counting on?
explanation: Start at 4 and add 9 steps of 3.

text: A jug has markings up to 500ml. Why can Safia not pour 1000ml of water into it?
options: The volume exceeds the jug's capacity

text: Two numbers (not 9 or 1458) have a common factor of 9 and LCM of 1458. What are they?
Mia has a 5kg bag of potatoes. She uses 1kg. What percentage of the bag of potatoes is left?
Work out: 5342 x 2
Write down the number that is one thousand times bigger than 10.42.
Write the calculation 7 ÷ 8 as a fraction.
A 9cm by 4cm rectangle is made of two triangles. Work out the area of one triangle.
Eva was faster than Mia (2.1s) but slower than Jamila (1.7s). Write a possible time for Eva.
explanation: Time must be between 1.7 and 2.1 seconds.

text: Work out 256 ÷ 8.
Order shortest to longest: 0.25h, 17 min, 1/3h, 600s.
A cereal box has a mass of 1.85 kg. A hotel uses 8 boxes weekly. What is the total mass?
Lily joins 9 square tiles. Each tile is 3/4 metre long. Calculate the total length.
Find the missing digit: 5.4 – 1.117 = 6.6 – 2.3_7
A 9cm by 4cm rectangle is made of two triangles. Work out the area of one triangle.
Which four numbers have a total of –3.142?
Write the calculation 7 ÷ 8 as a fraction.
Which of these calculations results in a positive answer?
Lily joins 9 square tiles. Each tile is 3/4 metre long. Calculate the total length.
Which digits complete 3_.49, 3_.08, and 3_.53 so they all round to 35?
Hassan has bags with 25, 33, 64, and 100 unit cubes. Which bag's cubes can be used to make one larger cube?
explanation: 64 is a cube number (4 x 4 x 4).

text: Which methods correctly calculate 531 x 6? Mike: 500x6 + 31x6; Oliver: 531x2x3; Ahmed: 500x6 + 30x6 + 1.
explanation: Mike uses distribution; Oliver uses factors.

text: Two shorter blocks (b and c) fit exactly on top of the longest block (a). Which statement is correct?
explanation: The length of a is the sum of lengths b and c.

text: Write down the number that is one thousand times bigger than 10.42.
A 16m garden fence is 80cm in a model. If a tree is 6m tall in the garden, what is its height in the model in cm?
A horizontal line passes through (2, 3). Which coordinate is also on this line?
In a fruit drink, 2/5 is orange juice and 3/8 is apple juice. What fraction of the drink is the remaining lemon juice?
Which digits complete 3_.49, 3_.08, and 3_.53 so they all round to 35?
What is the next number in the sequence 8, 15, 22, 29, ...?
How many circles are needed to make the 9th square number pattern?
Which same number fits in the boxes to make the sentence correct: [] x [] x [] = 27?
Which of these letters have rotational symmetry: S, T, O, X, E, L?
explanation: S, O, and X look the same when rotated.

text: Where should brackets be placed to make this correct: 20 – 2 ÷ 2 + 4 = 13?
Which of these values is equal to 1/2?
Which of these numbers rounds down to the nearest whole number?
What is the next number in the sequence 8, 15, 22, 29, ...?
Is the number 350 in the sequence 8, 15, 22, 29...?
Safia has yellow, green, and white balls. There is a 50% chance of picking white. Yellow and green are equal. What is the chance of picking yellow?
explanation: 50% left for Y+G. Half of 50% is 25%.

text: Mike, Oliver, and Carlos make 720 cookies (240 each). Eggs: Mike 1:5, Oliver 1:10, Carlos 1:6. How many eggs do they use in total?
Lily's journey takes 2 hours and 12 minutes. Mia's journey takes 0.6 hours longer. How long does Mia's journey take?
A house is 6m high and its model is 50cm high. If the house door is 2.4m high, how high is the door on the model?
What is the next number in the sequence 8, 15, 22, 29, ...?
Yuri rolls a fair dice. Which pair of events is mutually exclusive?
options: Roll a 1 and roll less than 3
Roll even and roll less than 3
explanation: You cannot roll both a 1 and a 6 at once.

text: Work out 2.8 × 4.
Write 2.25 hours in hours and minutes.
Work out 64.23 ÷ 3.
A rectangle measures 3 cm by 5 cm and is made from two triangles. Work out the area of one triangle.
Which number equals 5 when rounded to the nearest whole number?
Two angles in a triangle are 43° and 33°. Work out the size of the third angle.
London is 5°C and Moscow is -7°C. How many degrees warmer is London than Moscow?
Mike counts back from 1.7 in steps of 0.4. If the sequence is 1.7, 1.3, 0.9, what are the next two numbers?
Which of these calculations results in a square number?
How many equal sides in isosceles, different angles in scalene, and symmetry lines in equilateral triangles?
Which of these are prime numbers?
Work out: 5 + 5 × 47 × 2
100g of flour needs 2 eggs. If Carlos uses 1kg of flour, how many eggs does he need?
What is the largest number that is a factor of 16, 32, and 40?
explanation: 8 is the highest common factor of all three.

text: There are 5 green sweets in a bag. If there is a 1 in 4 chance of picking green, how many total sweets are there?
Calculate (a) 2468 × 35 and (b) 455 ÷ 13.
Safia paints the faces of a 3x3x3 cube red. How many small unit cubes have exactly three faces painted red?
explanation: The 8 corner cubes have 3 faces painted.

text: What is the largest number that is a factor of 16, 32, and 40?
explanation: 8 is the highest common factor of all three.

text: Which of these numbers is divisible by both 6 and 9?
explanation: 738 is even and its digits sum to 18.

text: A car price is $1000 in Dec. Jan is 10% less. Feb is 20% more than Jan. What is the Feb price?
Rajiv says all decimals ending in 5 round up to the nearest whole. Which is a counterexample?
explanation: 0.05 ends in 5 but rounds down to 0.

text: Which number equals 5 when rounded to the nearest whole number?
What is the largest number that is a factor of 16, 32, and 40?
explanation: 8 is the highest common factor of all three.

text: Which number rounds to 6.6 when rounded to the nearest tenth?
The line from the centre of a circle to its circumference is called the:
explanation: The radius starts at the centre and ends at edge.

text: Which data is least useful for investigating the relationship between a child's size and age?
explanation: Hair colour does not relate to physical growth.

text: The number 3.142 has 3 ones, 1 tenth, 4 hundredths and 2 _______.
explanation: The 4th digit (2) is in the thousandths place.

text: Which number makes the statement correct: 1/8 < [ ]/8 < 7/8?
In the sequence (1,3), (2,6), (3,9), what is the term for position 4?
explanation: The term is 3 times the position (4 * 3 = 12).

text: A recipe for 12 cupcakes uses 200g flour. How much flour is needed for 6 cupcakes?
Which box in a Carroll diagram for divisibility by 4 and 8 will always be empty?
options: Divisible by 8 and not divisible by 4
Divisible by 4 and not divisible by 8
explanation: All multiples of 8 are also multiples of 4.

text: Complete the statement: 0.3 = [ ] / [ ]
What are the square and cube of the number 7?
Which of these shapes has rotational symmetry of order 3?
explanation: An equilateral triangle has order 3 symmetry.

text: The ratio of blue to yellow paint is 30:15. If 600 ml of blue is used, how much yellow is needed?
Yuri sorts angles into Group 1 (obtuse, acute, right) and Group 2 (reflex). What is the rule?
Which pair of events is mutually exclusive when scoring on a target with values 25, 50, and 100?
options: Scoring 25 and getting an even score
Scoring 100 and getting an even score
Scoring 50 and getting an even score
explanation: 25 is odd, so it cannot be an even score.

text: Lily makes a cuboid using 4 identical cubes. What could be the dimensions of her cuboid?
explanation: The total volume must be 4 cubic units.

text: Darius scores 40% and Chen scores 4/10 of the marks on a test. Who scored more?
Which division calculation is equivalent to the fraction 5/4?
What is the next number in the sequence: 1, 4, 9, 16, ...?
explanation: The sequence is square numbers: 5 x 5 = 25.

text: What is the 28th number in the sequence 1, 4, 9, 16, ...?
What is the name of the shape that connects all points exactly 6 cm from a single dot?
explanation: Points equidistant from a center form a circle.

text: Pierre flies from France to Canada (9 hours), leaving at 13:00. Why is 22:00 not the local arrival time?
explanation: Canada and France are in different time zones.

text: A cuboid has faces A, B, and C. Area A = 8 cm², Area B = 6 cm². Total surface area is 52 cm². Calculate the area of face C.
Complete the number sequence: 3.9, 3.2, 2.5, 1.8, 1.1, ...
explanation: The sequence decreases by 0.7 each time.

text: Sugar starts at 19 °C and reaches 105 °C. By how many degrees does the temperature increase?
Calculate: 123.99 ÷ 3
Calculate: 24.9 × 4
Calculate 90.7 ÷ 100.
explanation: Move decimal point two places left.

text: Write 8/16 in its simplest form.
What is 3/4 of 8?
Mike walks for 7.1 minutes. How many seconds is 0.1 minutes?
257 ÷ 25 = 10 remainder ...
Calculate 93.54 - 8.41.
What is 3/4 of 8?
Is 945 in the sequence 35, 42, 49, 56, 63...?
Which calculation has a different answer from the others?
Calculate: 8 × 210 ÷ 21 + 9
An 8cm x 3cm rectangle is made of 4 identical triangles. Find the area of one triangle.
explanation: Total area 24 cm² divided by 4 is 6 cm².

text: A factory makes 1000 biscuits. 954 are whole and 46 are broken. What is the probability the next biscuit is whole?
Which numbers are divisible by 3 but not divisible by 9? Numbers: 105, 106, 309, 405, 702.
explanation: Sum of digits divisible by 3 but not 9.

text: Calculate 90.7 ÷ 100.
explanation: Move decimal point two places left.

text: A $1200 television is reduced by 15%. Calculate the new price.
Which estimate is closest to the answer of 36 × 99?
